name: Polar Bear
description:
This is a game about a little polar bear that is swimming in an ocean full of plastic bags and sharp ice!

The goal is to eat a lot of seals, watch out for toxic plastic bags and not  hit the ice because it is sharp. 

You use the Right and Left Arrow Keys to play.
Seals give you 1 point.
Plastic bags take away 2 points.
If you hit the ice or go below 0 points you die and need to start again.

Music is from YouTube free audio collection.
All art is made by me.

P.S. I fixed the bags position the day after and re-added the game to itch.
